description: User registration (STORY-052) requires the AWS Cognito User Pool (INFRA-1003-01) to be provisioned.
mitigation_plan: Prioritize infrastructure tasks at the beginning of Sprint 1 to unblock backend development.

description: Persisting user history (STORY-054) requires a functional login system (STORY-053) to identify the user.
mitigation_plan: Develop against a mock authentication context until the full login flow is stable.
impact_if_delayed: Delays implementation of all user data persistence features.

description: The formula editor (STORY-043) needs the list of defined variables from the variable definition step (STORY-042) to perform validation.
mitigation_plan: Define the data contract for the variable list object early.
impact_if_delayed: Blocks the core logic of the custom mode wizard.

description: Backend implementation for history persistence (part of STORY-054) requires the RDS database to be provisioned (INFRA-1002-02).
mitigation_plan: DevOps to provision DB in Sprint 2, unblocking backend work for Sprint 3. Backend can develop against a local Dockerized Postgres instance in the meantime.
